<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby starter
</h1>

__A gatsby starting template which includes:__

- Material UI with:
  - icons
  - theming
- Eslint with airbnb preset and:
  - import
  - jsx-a11y
  - react & hooks
  - import sort
  - prettier integration
- Prettier
- Webpack bundle analyzer

## How to use this template

### Gatsby CLI

Use the Gatsby CLI to create a new site, specifying this starter:

```shell
gatsby new my-site https://github.com/Alex-K1m/gatsby-starter
```

### Github template

Create a repository from template on github. On the main page of this repo, above the file list, click the green button __Use this template__.

## NPM Scripts

Default gatsby scripts plus:

- `lint` linting all .js & .jsx files
- `fix` fixes linting problems (that can be fixed), code style & sorting imports for all .js & .jsx files
